activeMsg: Codewind Tools for VSCode are active!
failedToReconnect: Couldn't reconnect to Codewind at {{- uri }}. Try re-creating the connection.
versionChanged: Codewind at {{- uri }} was previously version {{ oldVersion }}, but is now {{ newVersion }}.
invalidPortNumber: Invalid port "{{ port }}". Port must be a positive integer less than 65536.
connectFailed: Connecting to Codewind at {{- uri }} failed.

command.noContainerForShell: {{ projectName }} does not have an application container running. Wait until the project is Running.
command.alreadyInCodewindWorkspace: The Codewind workspace is already your workspace root.
command.confirmDeleteProjectMsg: Are you sure you want to remove {{ projectName }} from Codewind?
command.alsoDeleteDirMsg: Would you like to also delete the project directory at {{- dirPath }} ?
command.projectAlreadyBuilding: {{ projectName }} is already building. Build request cancelled.
command.explicitBuildNotNecessary: {{ projectName }} has auto-build enabled. There is no need to request a build.
command.seeProblemsView: See the Problems view for details.

cmdResourcePrompt.noProjToRunOn: There is no Codewind project to run this command on.
cmdResourcePrompt.noProjToRunOnWithStates: There is no {{ states }} Codewind project to run this command on.
cmdResourcePrompt.noConnToRunOn: The tools have not yet connected to Codewind. Start Local Codewind, or connect to a remote instance.
cmdResourcePrompt.noConnOrProjToRunOn: There is no Codewind connection or project to run this command on.
cmdResourcePrompt.noConnOrProjToRunOnWithStates: There is no Codewind connection, or {{ states }} project, to run this command on.

debug.didNotConnectInTime: Debugger did not attach within {{ timeoutS }}s.
debug.failedToAttach: Failed to attach debugger to {{ projectName }}.
debug.failedToAttachWithUrl: Failed to attach debugger to {{ projectName }} at {{- debugUrl }}.
debug.noDebugTypeKnown: No debug type available for project of type {{ type }}.
debug.noDebugPort: No debug port set for project {{ projectName }}. Try restarting the project into Debug mode again.
debug.maybeAlreadyDebugging: Are you already debugging this project?
debug.debuggerAttachSuccess: Debugger attached to {{ projectName }} at {{- debugUrl }}.
debug.waitingBeforeDebugAttachStatusMsg: Waiting before attaching debugger to {{ projectName }}

startup.openWorkspacePrompt:
Do you want to open your Codewind workspace folder now?

Tip: Open any folder in the Codewind view by right-clicking and selecting "Open Codewind Workspace"
startup.installPrompt: Codewind requires the installation of Docker containers to run, which might take a few minutes to download. Do you want to complete the installation now?
startup.installRejected: Codewind will remain unavailable until the Docker containers are installed. To initiate installation again, select Try Again or click the "on/off" toggle in the Codewind view.
startup.installFailed: Codewind failed to install. The installer logs have been opened. To initiate installation again, select Try Again or click the "on/off" toggle in the Codewind view.
startup.removeImagesBlockedStillRunning: You cannot remove images if Codewind is still running. Stop Codewind, and try again.
startup.removeImagesModalWarning: Are you sure you want to remove all Codewind Docker images? You will have to download them again before you can start Codewind again.
startup.backendUpgradeRequired: You cannot use the extension without installing version {{ tag }} of the Codewind backend.

logs.waitingForLogs: Waiting for Codewind to send logs...
logs.noLongerUpdating: This log is no longer updating: {{ reason }}.
logs.notUpdatingReasonDisabled: the project has been disabled. The log will be recreated when there is new output

project.alreadyRestarting: Restart cancelled: {{ projectName }} is already restarting.
project.restartSuccess: Finished restarting {{ projectName }} in {{ startMode }} mode.
project.restartFailure: Failed to restart {{ projectName }} in {{ startMode }} mode.
project.restartFailureWithReason: Failed to restart {{ projectName }} in {{ startMode }} mode: {{ reason }}.
project.restartFailedReasonDebugFailure: attaching the debugger failed. Try attaching the debugger again
project.restartFailedReasonTimeout: failed to restart within {{ timeoutS }} seconds

openInBrowserCmd.canOnlyOpenStartedProjects: {{ projectName }} is not running - wait until the project is Starting or Started and try again.
openInBrowserCmd.failedDetermineAppUrl: Could not determine application URL for {{ projectName }}.
openInBrowserCmd.cantOpenDisconnected: This connection is Disconnected. You cannot open Codewind if it is not running.

openLogCmd.noLogsForDisabled: Application Logs are not available for Disabled projects.
openLogCmd.projectIsNotStarted: {{ projectName }} is {{ projectState }}; it might not have any application log output until it starts.
openLogCmd.noBuildLogsForType: Build logs are not available for {{ projectType }} projects.
